title: Looking for F F Baker stamped back T206's
author: 2dueces

posts.post_title: Looking for F F Baker stamped back T206's
posts.post_content:
I know most our long time members know about my project but I like to bump this every 6 months or so. Hope it doesn't bother everyone. Without the help of our members I couldn't do this alone. I am up to 15 cards at this time and I did see a SEWELL stamped back if anyone is collecting them. Email me at [url]twodueces22@yahoo.com[/url]


Thanks to everyone. Joe
Here's one....PM me if you wanna swap. Dave.
Why not just buy a stamp and make them yourself?
